original_title: Breaking the Silence: Gay Youth in an American Town
overview: In a conservative American town where the prevailing opinion is that a gay crisis has been 'invented' by the liberal media, gay youth like 17-year-old Julio, an ex-Mormon who has attempted suicide, must face indifferent school officials and their own shame as they begin to break the silence surrounding LGBT issues.
title: Breaking the Silence: Gay Youth in an American Town
